text.config.pandoras-box.title: Pandora's Box
text.config.pandoras-box.option.box_long: The probability that, if the box can continue to generate effects, a new effect would be produced.
* Note: The maximum value, or 1, means it will go on indefinitely as long as effects can be produced.
text.config.pandoras-box.option.box_inte: Represents the intensity of the box, the higher this is, the more likely it is to produce multiple effects.
text.config.pandoras-box.option.good_eff: The probability that a 'good' effect will be chosen.
text.config.pandoras-box.option.max_effe: The highest amount of effects a box can hold.
